Description.Comment: All options but option 4 should turn NPC 1 into an enemy.

StoryText: Everyone got invited to %FirstName:NPC:2%'s birthday party! It's going to be great!
Question: Wait. Where's my invite?

OptionText.Text: Ask around to see if anyone else wasn't invited.
Ask %FirstName:NPC:2% direct why %Pron:1:1% didn't invite me!
Ask Mom what I should do about it.
Forge an invite and attend the party!

OptionResult.Result: I asked a few people in the class and it seems like there were a few of us who didn't get invited. I thought %FirstName:NPC:2% and I were better friends than that. It hurts, but I'm wiser now.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Not getting invited to a party - a rite of passage for everyone, I guess. It hurt, but I'm just that little bit wiser now.

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:NPC:2% was embarrassed. She told me her mom had only allowed her to ask so many people... and I didn't make it to the list. I told her: no hard feelings.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FirstName:NPC:1% didn't invite me to her party, but at least I had the confidence to ask her outright... and to forgive her. Older and wiser!

OptionResult.Result: I asked Mom what I should do about not being invited, and she told me to just ignore it and move on. She was right; it was no big deal and soon I had forgotten all about %FirstName:NPC:1%'s party.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My Mom is such a source of wisdom! She helped me through not being invited to %FirstName:NPC:1%'s precious little birthday party. Thanks, Mom.

OptionResult.Result: I managed to photocopy one of %FirstName:NPC:1%'s invites, and turned up to the party. %FirstName:NPC:1% looked a little surprised to see me, but acted like it was fine. We had a great time!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: If you don't get invited to a party, guess what? Just turn up! It was a brave move, but I got my slice of cake for my troubles. Win/win!
